text: Volodymyr Volodymyrovych Borodiansky (; born 15 January 1974) is a Ukrainian television manager, entrepreneur and politician. On 29 August 2019, he was appointed as the Minister of Culture, Youth and Sports. == Biography == In 1997, he graduated from Kyiv National Economic University. Since 1998, Borodiansky was the Commercial Director of the Moskovskij Komsomolets in Ukraine newspaper. Since 2000, he headed the Media Assets Management Department of Alfa-Bank. Since 2004, Borodiansky was the CEO of STB. From 2012 to 2018, he was the head of the StarLightMedia group. Borodiansky was twice awarded the Professional Award. Advisor to the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelensky. == See also == * Honcharuk Government == References == == External links == * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:People from Novyi Rozdil Category:Kyiv National Economic University alumni Category:Ukrainian television managers Category:Ukrainian chief executives Category:STB (TV channel) people Category:21st-century Ukrainian businesspeople Category:Ukrainian producers Category:Culture ministers of Ukraine Category:Youth and sport ministers of Ukraine Category:21st-century Ukrainian politicians
title: Volodymyr Borodiansky
